com.highsoft.highcharts.Common.HIChartsClasses

Class HIDrilldown

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.highsoft.highcharts.Common.HIChartsClasses.HIDrilldown
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HIChartsJSONSerializable

    public class HIDrilldown
extends java.lang.Object
implements HIChartsJSONSerializable
    description: Options for drill down, the concept of inspecting increasingly high resolution data through clicking on chart items like columns or pie slices. The drilldown feature requires the drilldown.js file to be loaded, found in the modules directory of the download package, or online at (code.highcharts.com/modules/drilldown.js)[code.highcharts.com/modules/drilldown.js].

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      HIActiveAxisLabelStyle activeAxisLabelStyle
      description: Additional styles to apply to the X axis label for a point that has drilldown data.
      HIActiveDataLabelStyle activeDataLabelStyle
      description: Additional styles to apply to the data label of a point that has drilldown data.
      java.lang.Boolean allowPointDrilldown
      description: When this option is false, clicking a single point will drill down all points in the same category, equivalent to clicking the X axis label.
      HIAnimation animation
      description: Set the animation for all drilldown animations.
      HIDrillUpButton drillUpButton
      description: Options for the drill up button that appears when drilling down on a series.
      java.util.ArrayList series
      description: An array of series configurations for the drill down.

    • Field Detail

      • allowPointDrilldown

        public java.lang.Boolean allowPointDrilldown
        description: When this option is false, clicking a single point will drill down all points in the same category, equivalent to clicking the X axis label. demo: https://jsfiddle.net/gh/library/pure/highcharts/highcharts/tree/master/samples/highcharts/drilldown/allowpointdrilldown-false/ : Don't allow point drilldown default: true

      • activeAxisLabelStyle

        public HIActiveAxisLabelStyle activeAxisLabelStyle
        description: Additional styles to apply to the X axis label for a point that has drilldown data. By default it is underlined and blue to invite to interaction. demo: https://jsfiddle.net/gh/library/pure/highcharts/highcharts/tree/master/samples/highcharts/drilldown/labels/ : Label styles default: { "cursor": "pointer", "color": "#003399", "fontWeight": "bold", "textDecoration": "underline" }

      • drillUpButton

        public HIDrillUpButton drillUpButton
        description: Options for the drill up button that appears when drilling down on a series. The text for the button is defined in lang.drillUpText. demo: https://jsfiddle.net/gh/library/pure/highcharts/highcharts/tree/master/samples/highcharts/drilldown/drillupbutton/ : Drill up button

      • activeDataLabelStyle

        public HIActiveDataLabelStyle activeDataLabelStyle
        description: Additional styles to apply to the data label of a point that has drilldown data. By default it is underlined and blue to invite to interaction. demo: https://jsfiddle.net/gh/library/pure/highcharts/highcharts/tree/master/samples/highcharts/drilldown/labels/ : Label styles default: { "cursor": "pointer", "color": "#003399", "fontWeight": "bold", "textDecoration": "underline" }

      • series

        public java.util.ArrayList series
        description: An array of series configurations for the drill down. Each series configuration uses the same syntax as the series option set. These drilldown series are hidden by default. The drilldown series is linked to the parent series' point by its id.

      • animation

        public HIAnimation animation
        description: Set the animation for all drilldown animations. Animation of a drilldown occurs when drilling between a column point and a column series, or a pie slice and a full pie series. Drilldown can still be used between series and points of different types, but animation will not occur. The animation can either be set as a boolean or a configuration object. If true, it will use the 'swing' jQuery easing and a duration of 500 ms. If used as a configuration object, the following properties are supported: duration The duration of the animation in milliseconds. easing A string reference to an easing function set on the Math object. See http://jsfiddle.net/gh/get/library/pure/highcharts/highcharts/tree/master/samples/highcharts/plotoptions/series- animation-easing/ : the easing demo.
